section1.question2: Employees must submit a Bereavement Leave Request Form to their supervisor and provide documentation of the death (obituary, funeral program, or death certificate) within 7 calendar days of returning to work.
section1.question5: 1. Employee must submit an Overtime Request Form to their supervisor at least 24 hours before the anticipated overtime. 2. Supervisor must approve and sign the form. 3. The approved form must be submitted to Payroll before the end of the pay period.

question4: State and Federal Equal Employment Opportunity Posters

section3.question3: no later than 90 calendar days after the alleged incident
